Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.GameController
All Implemented Interfaces:
InputEventListener
public class GameController extends Object implements InputEventListener
Main Game Controller - Orchestrates game logic and state. Responsible for: - Handling all game events from user input - Communicating with the Board for game mechanics - Updating the GUI with game state changes - Managing score tracking - Handling game over and restart conditions - Managing Obstacle Mode challenges Implements InputEventListener to receive all input events (movement, rotation, hard drop, hold).

    • enableObstacleMode

      public void enableObstacleMode(int difficultyLevel)
      Enables Obstacle Mode and generates obstacles based on difficulty level.
      Parameters:
      difficultyLevel - the current game difficulty (1, 5, 10, or 15)

    • isObstacleMode

      public boolean isObstacleMode()
      Check if Obstacle Mode is enabled.
      Returns:
      true if in obstacle mode

      public void restartGame()
